participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.background: i'm a male. i have children and dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: passionate about teaching and helping others, with a love for food and documentaries.
participant_2.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: good morning. how are you? I am a male. what do you do for work?
I don't work any more, I'm retired. used to be a gym teacher though
I work at a company. it is a good job. I have been to the same for 5 years
I've been volunteering at a soup kitchen for 10 years. that's a good occupation
that's good. do you have any hobbies? I like to work in the company
I watch war documentaries, but really I spend my time at the soup kitchen
that's good. do you like american sports? I enjoy it. it is my favorite
I was a gym teacher, so sports is naturally my thing. I prefer baseball, but soccer is good too
baseball is good. do you enjoy it? I do it for a living
